    Chess 110:
    A Chess110Controller object controls the action of a Chess 110 chess game.
    Version:
    Feb 26, 2004
    Author:
    Alyce Brady

        public Chess110Controller()
        Constructs a Chess110Controller to control the progress of a Chess 110 game. This should be followed up with a call to setGUI.
